original_title: DFCC Bank unveils MySpace Self Banking Kiosk at MAS Intimates Thurulie
original_body_lines: Further expanding its convenient and accessible network of MySpace Self Banking Kiosks DFCC Bank unveiled the latest addition to its off-site network at the MAS Fabric Park at MAS Intimates Thurulie. The new MySpace Self Banking Kiosk provides 24/7 access to banking facilities for staff at MAS Intimates and others in the area.

In addition to banking services, the new DFCC MySpace Self Banking Kiosk provides facilities for bill payments, institutional payments, mobile reloads and more, including a Pay and Go Machine. Connected to the LankaPay network, the ATM also accepts all cards issued by local banks on the LankaPay network, along with both local- and foreign-issued JCB cards, for cash withdrawals, providing maximum connectivity and interoperability.

Discussing the unveiling, Aasiri Iddamalgoda – SVP of Business Banking at DFCC Bank said, “We are very pleased to announce that our DFCC MySpace Self Banking Kiosk is now fully-operational at the MAS Fabric Park.

We take this opportunity to appreciate the support we have received from MAS and look forward to serving the community in the area. Convenient access to banking and financial services is crucial in the modern age, and alongside our extensive digital offering, DFCC Myspace helps to bridge the gap between the digital and real worlds. We invite all members of the community in the area to visit our new off-site service point and enjoy the most convenient and user-friendly banking experience, 24/7.”

DFCC Bank’s MySpace Self Banking Kiosk at MAS Fabric Park, MAS Intimates Thurulie, was officially declared open on February 8th, 2023, amidst a special opening ceremony conducted in partnership with DFCC Bank and the Fair Trade and Joint Consultative Committee at MAS Intimates. Senior officials from DFCC Bank and MAS Intimates, along with community members, were present at the event. Among the guests of note was Aasiri Iddamalgoda, SVP Head of Retail Banking & SME, VP of Digital Strategy, Dinesh Jebamani, Vice President/ Regional Manager Region 05, Terrance Etugala and Branch Manager Kegalle Sanjaya Jayatilale and HR Manager MAS intimates Hiran Kularatne, Iranga Jayawickrama General Manager -Intimates, Sales /Digital Team of DFCC and Staff of MAS intimates attached to Fairtrade and Joint consultative committee.
